non_compliant.section: 我們可能會不定期修改隱私權的相關政策。如有任何變更，我們將不會另行通知個別使用者，因此我們鼓勵您定期查看我們的隱私權規範。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transparency Principle, Right to be informed
non_compliant.amend: Users must be informed about changes to the privacy policy in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form, free of charge.  Consider providing a summary of key changes.  Silence does not equal consent, so relying on users to regularly check for updates is insufficient.
